casebody.data:
Ross et al., Appellants, v. Tom Reith, Inc. et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Ross v. Tom Reith, Inc. (1995), 71 Ohio St.3d 563.]

(No. 94-2226 Submitted January 24, 1995 Decided February 22, 1995.) Murray & Murray Co., L.P.A., W. Patrick Murray and Steven C. Bechtel, for appellants. . Savoy, Bilancini, Flanagan & Kenneally and Patrick M. Flanagan, for appellees.

The discretionary appeal is allowed. The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed and the cause is remanded to the trial court on the authority of Brennaman v. R.M.I. Co. (1994), 70 Ohio St.3d 460, 639 N.E.2d 425.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Cook, J., not participating.
